title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', and 'd'. These classes are appearing prominently in the Open Type dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes are visible in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should not be visible in the Open Type dialog.
SR: To resolve this issue, I suggest either: a) sorting the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter, or b) completely filtering out the obfuscated classes.
